timeline.bodyText: These warnings are very configuration specific. If you pass the Configuration that is parsed in the constructor of XmlErrorHandler, than you can make these warnings configuration specific
timeline.author: gvanbrakel

timeline.bodyText:
LiquibaseImpl is not really a named object, so this is a tricky/hacky way to pass the name.
I suggest you pass the Configuration as an argument to databaseMigrator.configure() in IbisContext line 349, and use that as the named object
timeline.author: gvanbrakel
